THIS IS YOUR FAULT!

 Record-breaking hospitalizations 'overwhelm' Arizona, Texas as governors struggle to contain surge

urls.title: Record-breaking hospitalizations 'overwhelm' Arizona, Texas as governors struggle to contain surge
urls.description: "Each day I’ve been going into work over the last month is worse, and what I mean by worse is ... just overwhelmed with COVID patients," one doctor said.
